comments.author: Christoph Kiehl
comments.body: This patch adds code to check if the given EventState has a mixin that is derived from a node type that should not be blocked.

comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Fixed in revision: 464496

I've changed the patch a bit and moved some code into the EventState class.

Thank you for reporting this issue and providing a patch.

description: The current implementation of blocks() in EventFilter does not check if the given EventState has a mixin that is derived from one of the given node types.
summary: It's not possible to register event listeners that filters on mixin supertypes
